entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
